name: Operation: Sub-Deep
description:
An entry to Ludum Dare 48 - Deeper and Deeper By Jack Pavey

Controls: WASD

Unlock new fish to showcase in a tranquil marine environment by going deeper and deeper in your submarine and avoiding the hazardous fish along the way.

Third Party Assets:

Underwater assets by Luis Zuno @ansimuz

Music by Antti Luode
